mdRecord.dcterms:title: At Pistol's Point; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookSmall insert page 11; "At Pistol's Point. A Driver's Pluck Spoils Well-Planned Burglary. From Our Own Correspondent."; A driver for Macclesfield Silk Society's Mill was held up by five armed men, but he was able to avert any real harm.; May 28th of unspecified year, Weekly Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Criminal Behavior
